description:
Brake lights for your bike. Outfitted with Lezyne’s Alert technology, this little taillight gets brighter when you brake, and flashes when you stop. Whether your riding in traffic or in a pack, Alert lets those around you know when you’re slowing and when you’re stopped. With up to 75 lumens, this little light will help keep you seen, day or night. The KTV Pro uses 2 powerful red LEDs and a custom engineered reflector to provides over 270° of visibility. Five different modes have you covered, from a low steady on, all the way to a powerful daytime flash. Easy USB-charging comes via an integrated plug, simply pop off the rear cover and plug your light right into any standard USB port and you’re charging, no cable needed.

  • 5 lighting modes, 2 in steady and 3 in flashing; steady: 25 lumens (4.5h), lumens (14h), flash 1 – 30 lumens (10.5h), flash 2 – 30 lumens (6.5h) and day flash – 75 lumens (6.5h)
  • Alert mode gets brighter under braking and flashes when you come to a stop
  • Alert mode works across all light settings
  • Easy 1-button interface takes you through all your light’s modes
  • Wide-angle lens that provides over 270° of visibility
  • Aero post compatible mount
  • Integrated USB plug means you don’t need to carry a charging cable
  • LED charging indicator lets you know light needs charging, when it’s charging and when it’s ready to go
  • Silicone, tool-free mounting straps
  • IPX7 waterproofing protects your light from heavy downpours
name: Lezyne KTV Pro Alert Drive Rear Light
